languages.text: {n}Вигдис вновь поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, еще кое-что. На станции пока никто не знает о гибели Леди Теодоры и принятии вами титула. Наместнику Владайму мы сообщим — это нужно, чтобы воспользоваться верфью, к тому же он желал личной встречи именно с Вольным Торговцем, и не примет неизвестное ему лицо непонятного статуса. Однако остается вопрос с оглаской для всей станции. Вы можете официально объявить новости, торжественно обставить свое прибытие — либо же высадиться инкогнито".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис вновь поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, еще кое-что. На станции пока никто не знает о гибели леди Теодоры и принятии вами титула. Наместнику Владайму мы сообщим — это нужно, чтобы воспользоваться верфью, к тому же он желал личной встречи именно с Вольным Торговцем, и не примет неизвестное ему лицо непонятного статуса. Однако остается вопрос с оглаской для всей станции. Вы можете официально объявить новости, торжественно обставить свое прибытие — либо же высадиться инкогнито".

languages.text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис вновь поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, еще кое-что. На станции пока никто не знает о гибели Леди Теодоры и принятии вами титула. Наместнику Владайму мы сообщим — это нужно, чтобы воспользоваться верфью, к тому же он желал личной встречи именно с Вольным Торговцем, и не примет неизвестное ему лицо непонятного статуса. Однако остается вопрос с оглаской для всей станции. Вы можете официально объявить новости, торжественно обставить свое прибытие — либо же высадиться инкогнито".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. Nobody at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Governor Vladaym will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is waiting for a personal audience with the Rogue Trader, so he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either make the news by arranging a proper ceremony — or choose to visit the station incognito."

However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either make the news by arranging a proper ceremony — or choose to visit the station incognito."

However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

{n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis se gira hacia ti una vez más.{/n} «Una cosa más, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Nadie de la estación sabe de la muerte de Lady Theodora ni que ha heredado el cargo. Debemos informar al Señor Tocara, tanto porque es requisito para usar su puerto como porque espera una audiencia personal con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y no se reunirá con una persona de posición indeterminada. Sin embargo, queda el tema de anunciar su llegada. Puede elegir llegar a la estación con toda la pompa y ceremonia correspondiente o hacer una visita de incógnito».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis se gira hacia ti una vez más.{/n} «Una cosa más, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Nadie de la estación sabe de la muerte de Lady Theodora ni que ha heredado el cargo. Debemos informar al Señor Tocara, tanto porque es requisito para usar su puerto como porque espera una audiencia personal con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y no se reunirá con una persona de posición indeterminada. Sin embargo, queda el tema de anunciar su llegada. Puede elegir llegar a la estación con toda la pompa y ceremonia correspondiente o hacer una visita de incógnito».

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯再次转向你。{/n}“还有一件事情，舰长大人。落脚港目前还没人知道西奥多拉夫人已经去世，也没人知道您继承了行商浪人的头衔。我们会通知托卡拉总督，因为他不会与身份不明的人见面，而且只有通报身份，舰船才能入港。他也很期待与行商浪人的私人会面。不过还有一个问题，您要如何宣布您的到来呢？您可以举行合适的仪式来宣布您的到来，也可以采低调的方式偷偷造访落脚港。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯再次转向你。{/n}“还有一件事情，舰长大人。落脚港目前还没人知道西奥多拉夫人已经去世，也没人知道您继承了行商浪人的头衔。我们会通知托卡拉总督，因为他不会与身份不明的人见面，而且只有通报身份，舰船才能入港。他也很期待与行商浪人的私人会面。不过还有一个问题，您要如何宣布您的到来呢？您可以举行合适的仪式来宣布您的到来，也可以采低调的方式偷偷造访落脚港。”

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスが再びこちらを向く。{/n}「あとひとつよろしいでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン。ステーションには、シオドーラ様の訃報も、陛下がその称号を引き継いだ件も知る者はいません。領主・トカラの耳には入っております―ドックの使用に必要ですので。それから、リエージュは自由開拓者との個人的な謁見をお望みです。身分が定かではない相手とは会わない方なのです。ただ、陛下の到着を公表するか否かの問題がまだ残っていますね。きちんと豪華なセレモニーをしてステーションに到着することも、お忍びで訪れることも可能です」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスが再びこちらを向く。{/n}「あとひとつよろしいでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン。ステーションには、シオドーラ様の訃報も、陛下がその称号を引き継いだ件も知る者はいません。領主・トカラの耳には入っております―ドックの使用に必要ですので。それから、リエージュは自由開拓者との個人的な謁見をお望みです。身分が定かではない相手とは会わない方なのです。ただ、陛下の到着を公表するか否かの問題がまだ残っていますね。きちんと豪華なセレモニーをしてステーションに到着することも、お忍びで訪れることも可能です」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis wendet sich wieder dir zu.{/n} "Eines noch, Lord Captain. Niemand auf der Station weiß, dass Lady Theodora verstorben ist und Ihr den Titel geerbt habt. Lehnsherr Tocara wird darüber informiert – das ist erforderlich, damit wir das Dock benutzen dürfen, und außerdem erwartet er eine persönliche Audienz bei der Freihändlerin und würde niemals eine unbekannte Person mit unklarem Status akzeptieren. Dennoch bleibt die Frage der Ankündigung Eurer Ankunft. Ihr könnt entweder mit dem angemessenen Pomp und offizieller Zeremonie eintreffen – oder zunächst inkognito bleiben."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis wendet sich wieder dir zu.{/n} "Eines noch, Lord Captain. Niemand auf der Station weiß, dass Lady Theodora verstorben ist und Ihr den Titel geerbt habt. Lehnsherr Tocara wird darüber informiert – das ist erforderlich, damit wir das Dock benutzen dürfen, und außerdem erwartet er eine persönliche Audienz bei der Freihändlerin und würde niemals eine unbekannte Person mit unklarem Status akzeptieren. Dennoch bleibt die Frage der Ankündigung Eurer Ankunft. Ihr könnt entweder mit dem angemessenen Pomp und offizieller Zeremonie eintreffen – oder zunächst inkognito bleiben."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis se tourne à nouveau vers vous.{/n} « Une dernière chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Personne à Castel ne sait que dame Théodora est décédée et que vous avez hérité de son titre. Le suzerain Tocara en sera informé, cela fait partie des formalités requises pour pouvoir utiliser le quai. De plus, comme il attend une audience personnelle avec la libre-marchande, il refusera de rencontrer une personne au statut incertain. En dehors de cela, vous êtes libre de choisir comment vous souhaitez débarquer sur la station : soit incognito, soit en annonçant votre arrivée en grande pompe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis se tourne à nouveau vers vous.{/n} « Une dernière chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Personne à Castel ne sait que dame Théodora est décédée et que vous avez hérité de son titre. Le suzerain Tocara en sera informé, cela fait partie des formalités requises pour pouvoir utiliser le quai. De plus, comme il attend une audience personnelle avec la libre-marchande, il refusera de rencontrer une personne au statut incertain. En dehors de cela, vous êtes libre de choisir comment vous souhaitez débarquer sur la station : soit incognito, soit en annonçant votre arrivée en grande pompe. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis yeniden sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bir şey daha var Lord Kaptan. İstasyondakiler, Leydi Theodora'nın ölümünden ve ünvanını artık sizin nail olduğunuzdan haberdar değiller. Emîr Tocara'ya bilgi verilecek. Bu, rıhtımı kullanabilmemiz için gerekli. Ayrıca Hür Tacir ile kişisel bir görüşme yapmayı bekliyor; mevkisi belli olmayan, muğlak biriyle görüşme yapmayacaktır. Gelişinizi duyurma konusu ise ayrı. Mevkinize yakışan, ihtişamlı bir törenle veyahut da kimliğinizi gizleyerek istasyona giriş yapabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis turns to you again.{/n} "One more thing, Lord Captain. No one at the station knows about Lady Theodora's demise and you inheriting the title. Liege Tocara will be informed — it is required so we can use the dock, and besides, he is expecting a personal audience with the Rogue Trader — he will not meet with an unknown person of unclear standing. However, there is still the matter of announcing your arrival. You can either arrive on the station with the proper pomp and ceremony — or choose to visit it incognito."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis yeniden sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bir şey daha var Lord Kaptan. İstasyondakiler Leydi Theodora'nın ölümünden ve ünvanını artık sizin taşıdığınızdan haberdar değiller. Emîr Tocara'ya bilgi verilecek. Bu, rıhtımı kullanabilmemiz için gerekli. Ayrıca Hür Tacir ile kişisel bir görüşme yapmayı bekliyor, kim olduğunu bilmediği muğlak biriyle görüşme yapmayacaktır. Gelişinizi duyurma konusu ise ayrı. İstasyona mevkinize yakışan, ihtişamlı bir seremoniyle veyahut da kimliğinizi gizleyerek giriş yapabilirsiniz."
